QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, rsm_req_resources.id odf_pk, requisition_id.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, requisition_id.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, rsm_req_resources.TEAM_ID as team_id, rsm_req_resources.AVAILABILITY_SCORE as availability_score, rsm_req_resources.REQUEST_CURVE as request_curve, srm_resources.UNIQUE_NAME as resource_unique_name, rsm_req_requisitions.NAME as req_name, requisition_id.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as last_updated_by, rsm_req_requisitions.OBJECT_ID as project_id, srm_resources.FULL_NAME as resource_full_name, RSM_REQ_RESOURCES.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, rsm_req_resources.REQUEST_FINISH as request_finish, rsm_req_resources.IS_SELECTED as selected, rsm_req_resources.IS_PREFERRED as preferred, rsm_req_resources.REQUEST_START as request_start, rsm_req_requisitions.STATUS_CODE as req_status, rsm_req_requisitions.REQUEST_FINISH as req_request_finish, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by, rsm_req_resources.REQUIREMENT_ID as requirement_id, rsm_req_resources.OVERALL_SCORE as overall_score, rsm_req_resources.REQUISITION_ID as requisition_id, rsm_req_requisitions.REQUISITION_CODE as req_code, rsm_req_resources.SKILLS_SCORE as skills_score, rsm_req_resources.RESOURCE_ID as resource_id, RSM_REQ_RESOURCES.CREATED_DATE as created_date, odf_ca_reqresource.partition_code as partition_code, rsm_req_requisitions.REQUEST_START as req_request_start, requisition_id.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code, requisition_id.project_id as odf_grand_parent_id from rsm_req_resources rsm_req_resources JOIN srm_resources CREATED ON CREATED.user_id=rsm_req_resources.created_by JOIN srm_resources UPDATED ON UPDATED.user_id=rsm_req_resources.last_updated_by JOIN srm_resources srm_resources ON srm_resources.id=rsm_req_resources.resource_id JOIN rsm_req_requisitions rsm_req_requisitions ON rsm_req_requisitions.id=rsm_req_resources.requisition_id JOIN odf_ca_reqresource odf_ca_reqresource ON odf_ca_reqresource.id=rsm_req_resources.id JOIN (select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, rsm_req_requisitions.id odf_pk, project_id.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, project_id.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, project_id.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, rsm_req_requisitions.OBJECT_ID as project_id, project_id.entity as odf_entity_code from rsm_req_requisitions rsm_req_requisitions JOIN (select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, inv_investments.id odf_pk, inv_investments.entity_code as entity, odf_ca_inv.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, odf_ca_inv.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, odf_ca_inv.odf_period_end as odf_period_end from inv_investments inv_investments JOIN pac_mnt_projects PAC_MNT_PROJECTS ON PAC_MNT_PROJECTS.id=inv_investments.id JOIN odf_ca_inv odf_ca_inv ON odf_ca_inv.id=inv_investments.id join odf_object_instance_mapping oim1 on inv_investments.id = oim1.primary_object_instance_id and oim1.primary_object_instance_code='project' join fin_financials fin_financials on oim1.secondary_object_instance_id = fin_financials.id and oim1.secondary_object_instance_code='financials' JOIN odf_ca_financials odf_ca_financials ON odf_ca_financials.id=FIN_FINANCIALS.id where 1 = 1 ) project_id ON project_id.odf_pk=rsm_req_requisitions.OBJECT_ID where 1 = 1 ) requisition_id ON requisition_id.odf_pk=rsm_req_resources.REQUISITION_ID where 1 = 1
